message:
‎"State Rep. Sharon Cissna is returning to Alaska by sea after refusing a pat-down search at a Seattle airport... she underwent a body scan & was then required to undergo the pat-down by TSA or leave Sea-Tac airport. Cissna says TSA called for the pat-down because the scan showed Cissna had had a mastectomy..."

http://seattletimes.nwsource.com/html/localnews/2014289436_apaklawmakerairportsearch1stld.html
